text:
="preserve">Žarko Domljan (14 September 1932 – 5 September 2020) was a Croatian politician. He was the first Speaker of the Croatian Parliament after Croatia's independence from Yugoslavia. He was the speaker from 30 May 1990 to 2 August 1992. He later was a Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe.
Domljan died on 5 September 2020 in Zagreb, aged 87.

annotations.surface_form: Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe
